name: Grumpy Cat
description:
Tardar Sauce (born April 4, 2012), commonly known as Grumpy Cat, is a cat Internet and media personality and actress. She is known for her permanently "grumpy" facial appearance, which is caused by an underbite and feline dwarfism.f

feature-1-text: We make wine by hand in small batches. Every grape bunch is carefully hand picked to ensure great taste and quality wine.
feature-2-text: Our vineyard is family owned and operated with 20 years of experience growing grapes and making wine.
feature-3-text: The wines we make are bold and flavorful. They are filtered less than commercial wines which gives them character.
